name: Lit Path
description:
Light the way. Lead the tribe. Leave your mark.

Share your fire with the rest of the people of the islands in this incredible island hopping puzzle adventure! It's never a dull night when your torch is the only way you get to see where you're going. Light the way by placing totems that light an area. Be careful, though, place the totem in an area where you can't get to then you'll be leading yourself to certain doom.

It takes patience, careful planning, and the bright light of your flame to traverse these islands, empower your people and start civilizations!
